resources.string: Thanks for installing - Let\'s get you set up!

My Calendar consists of a basic calendar view with all your events listed based on date. You can click an event and see a detailed descriptive view of the event. You can delete an event by long pressing it. You can add a new event by clicking on the \'+\' icon on the bottom right cornor of the screen.

PU Calendar consists of all the events of Pondicherry University created by the Admin Team. You can even set your own reminder for those events individually. \n\nNote : These events are Official Events of Pondicherry University and cannot be deleted/modified by you.

My Contacts page consists of all user created contacts. You can click on each contact and view their basic contact information. You can even call/email them directly from the application by clicking on their number/email address.

PU Contacts consists of all Pondicherry University contacts created by the Admin Team based on department/roles/designation etc. You can view/call/email any contacts from inside the application. \n\nNote : These contacts are Official Contacts of Pondicherry University and cannot be deleted/modified by you.
This page displays your basic information and the status of the application i.e., Active/Inactive/Under Maintanance.
This page contains additional operations like event pdf generation, vcf generation etc. It also has the option of changing language of the application.

PU DigiPlanner is a mobile app to cater the needs of stake holders i.e., Pondicherry University to keep track of the academic calendar of the University along with storing their activities with reminders. This app also provides the contact details of Pondicherry University Teaching and Non-Teaching personnel with department/centre/school contact details. More than that the users can store their contacts with ease of calling/emailing.

Dr. Clement Sagayaradja Lourdes
Professor & H.O.D
Department of English

Conceptualized by

Dr. V. Prasanna Venkatesan
Professor
Department of Banking Technology
PU Docs is a place where you can view and download common documents shared by Pondicherry University such as exam timetables, practical dates etc.

PU DigiPlanner
